views.markdown:
Changelog 1.5.1: * iOS 10 support (iOS 6 - 10) * Visual improvements * Checkmark indicates currently connected network * New preference panel with options Special thanks to @ichitaso for contributing to WiPi Changelog 1.4:
--------------------
- Support for iOS 8
- Codebase improvements
- CCToggles incompatibility fix

Changelog 1.3
------------------
- Compiled for 64 bit / iPhone 5s!
- Hold on the Control Center WiFi toggle to activate WiPi!

Changelog 1.2
-------------------
- Full iOS 7 support, yay!
- Hold on the FlipSwitch WiFi toggle to open up WiFi. Works for example with FlipControlCenter, Auxo, Ayra, SwitchIcons, ...
- Bug fixes! No more freezes / crashes!
Changelog 1.1:
------------------
- Removed signal strength limit
- Fixed bug where HUD did not hide
- Optimized code
